verses.translation: Woe to the defrauders,

verses.text_madani: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Who, when they take the measure (of their dues) from men take it fully,
But when they measure out to others or weigh out for them, they are deficient.
Do not these think that they shall be raised again
For a mighty day,
The day on which men shall stand before the Lord of the worlds?

verses.text_madani: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: Nay! most surely the record of the wicked is in the Sijjin.
And what will make you know what the Sijjin is?
It is a written book.
Woe on that day to the rejecters,
Who give the lie to the day of judgment.

verses.text_madani: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none gives the lie to it but every exceeder of limits, sinful one

verses.text_madani: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our communications are recited to him, he says: Stories of those of yore.

verses.text_madani: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay! rather, what they used to do has become like rust upon their hearts.

verses.text_madani: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay! most surely they shall on that day be debarred from their Lord.
Then most surely they shall enter the burning fire.

verses.text_madani: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then shall it be said: This is what you gave the lie to.

verses.text_madani: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: Nay! Most surely the record of the righteous shall be in the Iliyin.
And what will make you know what the highest Iliyin is?
It is a written book,
Those who are drawn near (to Allah) shall witness it.
Most surely the righteous shall be in bliss,
On thrones, they shall gaze;
You will recognize in their faces the brightness of bliss.
They are made to quaff of a pure drink that is sealed (to others).

words.translation: They will be given to drink

verses.text_madani: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: The sealing of it is (with) musk; and for that let the aspirers aspire.
And the admixture of it is a water of Tasnim,
A fountain from which drink they who are drawn near (to Allah).

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Surely they who are guilty used to laugh at those who believe.
And when they passed by them, they winked at one another.

verses.text_madani: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their own followers they returned exulting.

verses.text_madani: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them, they said: Most surely these are in error;
And they were not sent to be keepers over them.

verses.text_madani: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: So today those who believe shall laugh at the unbelievers;
On thrones, they will look.

verses.text_madani: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Surely the disbelievers are rewarded as they did.
